Posts.EditableText:
Is that davidw's last name?  There are reviews on the text game server that are from a David Welbourne.  One of the reviews is a 4 out of 5.  As any of you may know, this is unheared of coming from the dw we have all grown to love.  So tell me...who is David Welbourne?

By the way, this person who reviewed the game put a walkthrough of it on his own site.  Something even further unexpected from our dw.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
Nope, nothing to do with me. (My surname's Whyld.)

[url:a6qw5f0v]http://webhome.idirect.com/~dswxyz/[/url:a6qw5f0v] for David Welbourne's home page.

I have to admit I'm kind of shocked to see a review of a Quest game by a non-Quest writer getting 4 out of 5. Has Quest finally produced a decent game just as I decide I'm never going to play one again?

Although I notice thr author is the same one who I played a couple of games by, both of which were almost unplayable. Has he really improved so much or is the other Davidw just in an over generous mood?

Posts.EditableText: haha..that was good.  As soon as I saw "Whyld", I remember seeing that before.  It slipped my mind when I was reading Melbourne's reviews....
